general.description: Personal website of Tomas Pustelnik. A front-end developer with focus on HTML/CSS, React, performance and accessibility. Founder of Qjub.app and tooling addict.
general.title: Optimizing CSS for faster page loads - Tomas Pustelnik's personal website

openGraph.title: Optimizing CSS for faster page loads
openGraph.description: Learn how CSS affects page load times and how you can improve it by optimizing your CSS build pipeline and the way you load it.
